Package de.intarsys.aaa.resource

Interface Summary
IResource An IResource is the target of a permission check.
IResourceAccessHandler An IResourceAccessHandler can protect access to an IResource.
IResourceRegistry A registry for IResource instances
 

Class Summary
DenyResourceAccessHandler An IResourceAccessHandler that denies every access.
GrantResourceAccessHandler An IResourceAccessHandler that grants every access.
Resource A common superclass for IResource
ResourceAccessHandler A VM singleton for the IResourceAccessHandler.
ResourceRegistry A VM singleton for the IResourceRegistry
StandardResourceRegistry A simple implementation for an IResourceRegistry
StaticResource A resource abstracted as a simple "id".
 

Exception Summary
ResourceAccessException  
 

Annotation Types Summary
ProtectedResource Mark an object that has to be protected by some security handling mechanism
